name: Yu Wang 0093
content: Yu Wang Search Yu WANG Assistant Researcher Nanjing University Biography I’m an assistant researcher at the Software Engineering Group (SEG) at Nanjing University. My research interests lie in software testing and program language, including static and dynamic analysis. Recently, I focus on improving the performance of program analysis by machine learning. I am currently recruiting PhD, Master’s, and undergraduate students. If you’re interested, please feel free to reach out to me via email. Interests Software Engineering Programming Language Artificial Intelligence Education PhD in Computer Science, 2014.09 - 2021.03 Nanjing University Visiting Scholar, 2017.10 - 2018.10 University of California, Davis Visiting Scholar, 2017.02 - 2017.09 Hong Kong University of Science and Technology BSc in Software Engineering, 2010.09 - 2014.06 University of Electronic Science and Technology of China Featured Publications Checkout all publications.
